ComicInfo.Summary:
Aunt Johnny & Earl discover they have a new serial killer on the loose, while Rachel spreads the word around town that she was murdered and she is looking for the man responsible! And to make it a perfect day, Zoe runs into an old classmate.
Who murdered Rachel? While probing her own murder and Rachel finally has tightened the list of suspects to two possibilities. But what she isn’t aware of someone very close to her with a shocking secret - one worth murder to keep.
Note: The digital edition (8/6/2014) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 15:33:16. [CVDB461925]
ComicInfo.Characters: Detective Corpell, Earl, Jet, Johnny Woodall, Rachel Beck, Ray, Zoe Mann
